artist: Engraver: Charles Grignion; Delineator: Johann Ludwig Fäsch
description: full length drawing of a man facing right wearing knee length coat, vest, knee length pants, buckle shoes and striped stockings; a fashion plate?

Signature, Date, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [De Fesch delin\'t   C. Grignion Sculpt./ Published by Jefferys & Faden  the Corner of St. Martin\'s Lane, Charring Cross;/ as the Act directs 1 May 1773];  on sheet in pencil:[1-503]
